generalfeedback.text:
General feedback

The shape shown is a {@shape_name@}.

The order of rotational symmetry is the number of distinct rotations less than \(360^\circ\) that map the shape exactly onto itself.

For this shape, the correct order of rotational symmetry is:

\[ \boxed{{@order_sym@}} \]

Try mentally rotating the shape about its centre and counting how many times it matches itself before a full turn.
